title: Ticket #1740: Add contrib modules to Condor source tree
description:
Various contrib modules for Condor already exist. Some of them it may be useful to be hosted released with the Condor source branch. A more detailed description thereof can be found on the ContribModules wiki page.

Current ToDos:

  • include condor pigeon code with Condor source code (build with nightlies?)
  • documentation wiki on pigeon
  • documentation wiki on quill
remarks:
2011-Feb-01 16:20:02 by tannenba:
Bulk change of target version from v070506 to NULL using ./ticket-target-mover.

2011-Feb-03 09:00:38 by cweiss:
I am going to modify the due date to Feb 4, since I still need to change condor_pigeon to cmake. I am likely going to do that while I am traveling, so I'll push it tomorrow.
